alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 24 at 4:04AM CST until November 26 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT CST SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...Buffalo County. * WHEN...From noon today to midnight CST Saturday Night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...It will not snow throughout the entire duration of this Advisory, with snow instead falling intermittently. There is also some uncertainty in snow amounts, as dry air could potentially delay the onset of snow and reduce amounts, especially this afternoon and evening. No matter how much it snows, confidence is high that blowing and drifting snow will not be a significant issue, with winds only averaging 5 to 15 MPH, from the east most of the time but shifting to westerly Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
